tim.pacman

Class PacmanApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
      • tim.pacman.PacmanApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.Game, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener

    public class PacmanApplication
extends org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
    The entry point for the pac man plus, a pacman clone with a few more features.
    • Multiplayer mode on one keyboard -> Use WASD for player one, and arrow keys for player two.
    • Multiplayer mode on LAN -> Detects any LAN connections for the pacman port.
      • Game Modes
      • Built to Last - Try to avoid the monsters in the middle, which only get more dangerous!
      • 1 v 1: Classic pacman, play in multiplayer mode against another person and attempt to survive longer
      • Tag: Try to tag the other person, the longer you are not it the more points you get. The person with the most points at end of game wins
    Author:
    Timothy

      • drawCenteredText

        public static java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float drawCenteredText(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics,
                                               java.lang.String txt,
                                               float y)
        Draws the specified text in the center of the screen at the specified y coordinate. If the text contains any websites or emails, they will be made clickable.
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphics to use for drawing
        txt - the text
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        the location where the text is

      • drawCenteredHText

        public static boolean drawCenteredHText(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics,
                        java.lang.String txt,
                        float y)
        Draws the specified text in the center of the screen and returns if it is being clicked. Same as drawCenteredText(graphics, txt, 0, Display.getWidth(), y)
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphics
        txt - the text
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        if it is being pressed

      • drawCenteredHText

        public static boolean drawCenteredHText(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics,
                        java.lang.String txt,
                        float leftX,
                        float rightX,
                        float y)
        Draws a centered text, except rather than using 0 and the screen width it uses set values.
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphics
        txt - the text
        leftX - the left x
        rightX - the right x
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        if it is being clicked

      • drawText

        public static java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float drawText(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics,
                                       java.lang.String txt,
                                       float x,
                                       float y)
        Draws the specified text at the specified coordinate. If the text contains any websites or emails they will be highlighted and upon being pressed the appropriate website or mailto address will be opened.
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphics
        txt - the text
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        the location where the text is being drawn

      • drawText

                                       boolean b)
        Same as the global one but does not highlight websites if told not to
        Parameters:

        txt - the text to write
        x - xcoord
        y - ycoord
        b - highlight website
        Returns:
        the rectangle the text is located in
